Package hw4

package hw4
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    MostSimilarWord
    The MostSimilarWord class have two methods to find the most similar word to a specific word for a hashMap with other words.
    SemanticDescriptors
    The SemanticDescriptors class have one static method for creating semantic descriptors hashMap for a given list of sentences.
    SentenceGenerator
    This Class is a Sentence Generator.
    SynonymQuestion
    This Class represents a Synonym Question.
    SynonymQuiz
    The SynonymQuiz class represents a synonym quiz with a list of synonym questions.
    SynonymQuizTest
    This is a Test class for the hw4 package.
    TextGenerator
    This Class is a Text Generator.
    WordGenerator
    This Class is a Word Generator.
